Articles.Content: Can somebody explain to me how to install and use the extended hangar mod because it is not specific at all for update .25
Activate it by using the * key, alternatively edit the settings.txt file.
Thanks for the response but I am one sucky noob how do I insert the file because I'm just used to inserting the game data files into game data but for this mod its not like that

If you had tried it you would've seen that it doesn't matter where you put the .dll file as long as it is in the GameData folder...

I usually keep them in their own folder though, that would be "FShangarExtender".
Thanks for your patience and help it works great now
